content: Cori, your brave statement of love and commitment to the idea that all lives matter, and your willingness to share this heartbreaking story leave me humbled. Those of us who know you, also appreciate our talent as a filmmaker — including the upcoming Bending the Arc documentary about Partners in Health — and the truly extraordinary work you do at Strong Heart creating life-changing opportunities for children who have survived conflict. Today, you reminded me to appreciate the living just a little bit more. Thank you.
